entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
